meanings.definition: A person who is undergoing training again.
meanings.sent1: The retrainee quickly caught up with the new techniques.
meanings.sent2: The company hired a retrainee to improve their skills.
meanings.sent3: The retrainee joked that they were becoming a professional student.
meanings.sent4: She was like a sponge, soaking up knowledge as a retrainee.
meanings.sent5: The determined retrainee practiced diligently to master the material.

meanings.definition: Someone who is being trained again.
meanings.sent1: As a retrainee, he felt excited to refresh his knowledge.
meanings.sent2: The retrainee showed great progress in the training program.
meanings.sent3: The retrainee playfully pretended to be a rookie again.
meanings.sent4: She embraced the challenge of being a retrainee with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent5: The experienced retrainee shared valuable insights with the group.
